markdownRemark.html: In one of my last posts, I shared the announcement of Hooks by the React team with you. About two weeks ago, the React team finally released the Hooks API with version 16.8. In this blogpost I want to share one approach of how to use the useContext Hook along with useReducer to create and update context.

frontmatter.title: How to use context in React with Hooks
frontmatter.spoiler: One approach of using useContext along with useReducer
